page.title: 02Looking at Milton Common (1)
page.content: We began looking at the buildings from the London end and we saw Heath House, a big house with lots of windows. We counted 11 houses , and they were semi detached .I live in one of them . There were 12 bungalows and some had been converted into houses . Some students live in one of them. There are three garages, one is a big shed where they mend and sell cars, another sells motorbikes, and another also sells and mends cars There is a County Council Depot where my dad works. He salts the roads in winter and works on the motorway. There are two scrapyards, a water tower and a stable block. Near the water tower is a public house called the Three Pigeons. By Sophie Wilkins.
